welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yiwu, China! Known for its vibrant markets and rich cultural heritage, Yiwu is a charming city waiting to be explored. We invite you to immerse yourself in its unique atmosphere and enjoy all that Yiwu has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yiwu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
